thread.section_title: The Knife Merchant, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Knife Merchant, Inc | www.knifemerchant.com
thread.title: Howard Richardson:
thread.title_full: The Knife Merchant, Inc reviewed by Howard Richardson:

author: Howard Richardson:
title: Howard Richardson:
text:
I've been a new client just under a year and have made two on line purchases, one in store purchase
My most recent purchase exceeded all my expectations
The selection, timely shipment and amazing product has me shopping for my next new knife
Thank you knife Merchant
You rock!!!
